fields.description:
As a cloud administrator I would like federated role credentials to be available via instance meta-data so I can use instance profiles across my federated clouds.

Acceptance criteria:
Given an instance with an instance profile running in a federated region, when I consume services using credentials obtained via instance meta-data then service access succeeds or fails according to the applicable policies.
